registers.name: GPIO_OUT_REG
registers.description: Sets the output level for each GPIO configured as an output.

registers.name: GPIO_ENABLE_REG
registers.description: Enables or disables output mode on individual GPIO pins.

registers.name: UART0_STATUS_REG
registers.description: Provides FIFO status flags and interrupt state for UART0.

registers.name: GPIO_OUT_REG
registers.description: Controls the output values for GPIO pins set to output mode.

registers.name: GPIO_FUNC_OUT_SEL_CFG0_REG
registers.description: Configures the signal routing for GPIO0 output functions.

registers.name: UART0_INT_RAW_REG
registers.description: Raw interrupt status bits for UART0, prior to masking.

registers.name: GPIO_OUT_REG
registers.description: Sets output logic levels for GPIO pins in output mode.

registers.name: GPIO_ENABLE_REG
registers.description: Controls the output enable state for each GPIO pin.

registers.name: UART0_CLKDIV_REG
registers.description: Sets the clock divider that defines the UART0 baud rate.
